Posts.Content: jushavinfun wrote: Hello again, I was here a while ago (well never left been lurking a bit lol) but anyways back in April I had my baseline mammograms and they something and brought me back in for a compression test and a u/s then decided that I didn't need the u/s that I needed to have a biopsy..I went to a well known breast cancer center and they did a 3D mammogram ans an u/s..now the first place had me listed as a birads 3 then at the 2nd place still has me as a 3 but in the next breath they tell me they didn't see anything on the ultra sound and told me to come back in 6 months...now I am more confused then ever...my breast is still bigger than the other and now I can feel a lump..I have no rash and no pain but I have had pain in my shoulder that is real sharp and I have night sweats while even sleeping with the a/c on and I have lost 13pounds with out changing anything in my life...my Dr got my report back from the second place and called me to ask me to please seek a second opinion which I am thankful for cause I didn't agree either with the findings of the second place...a couple of questions I have is what would make my one breast larger than the other and is it possible that BC doesn't show up on an ultrasound? Has anyone else had the same symptoms I had and or had them say they saw nothing and it turned out to be.Thanks for any help my apt is July 2nd.... Women are like tea bags you never know how strong they are until you put them in hot water Log in to post a reply
